content: Welcome to the 22nd Century Folks..this is what will power anti-gravity and a whole list of other technology. For those of you that want to keep using stone tablets and chisels, that's fine with me...but let the rest of us move fast and ahead toward the future. "The neutrons produced in the experiments "may not be caused by fusion but perhaps some new, unknown nuclear process," added Krivit, who has monitored cold fusion studies for the past 20 years. "We're talking about a new field of science that's a hybrid between chemistry and physics." "Scientists in possible cold fusion breakthrough" "Researchers at a US Navy laboratory have unveiled what they say is "significant" evidence of cold fusion, a potential energy source that has many skeptics in the scientific community. " "http://www.breitbart.com/article.php?id=CNG.a67cf72fe27770f9ec992da18169937d.a1&show_article=1" Cold Fusion Is Real! Well Well Well, I guess us C2C listeners are not so crazy at all.

content: It is strange when you think about it....Einsteins theory of General Relativity perfectly describes the world of the "very big"(Stars, galaxies..etc) as predictable and ordered... While the study of the "very small"(Quantum Mechanics) is not predictable or ordered... How does the anarchy of the subatomic world lead to the grace and tranquility of the universe??

content: --- I can remember the two bunko cons who splashed the cold fusion news ago. At the time, I was really hoping for the best, being a lifelong cosmology student & deep into quantum mech., string therory, dark matter & now the latest & greatest, "Uneven Expansion" as in "our known universe lies within the center of a giant cosmic void". wow-Wow-WOW! Now this is the kind of thread worth reading! I got the scoop from my Apr. Scientific American mag. - Heavy stuff guys. --- P.S. -- Crackerjack - Yes, science is a pure republic. Also, have you read Twain`s, "Letters from the earth"? I have a copy. The church banned it like forever! -- Also to Irwin-R_S.... your quote of "anarchy of the subatomic world", reminds me of a famous egghead who studied mostly "electrons" saying, "they were the closest thing on earth to TRUE Black Magic". -- Love this stuff.

The only problem is, it would collapse the world wide house of cards economy that is built on the "wealth of oil"... It would also remove the chief source of funding for mid eastern terrorists, oil money!... IMHO... Respectfully, SUNLINER81

content: --- I can remember the two bunko cons who splashed the cold fusion news ago. At the time, I was really hoping for the best, being a lifelong cosmology student & deep into quantum mech., string therory, dark matter & now the latest & greatest, "Uneven Expansion" as in "our known universe lies within the center of a giant cosmic void". wow-Wow-WOW! Now this is the kind of thread worth reading! I got the scoop from my Apr. Scientific American mag. - Heavy stuff guys. --- P.S. -- Crackerjack - Yes, science is a pure republic. Also, have you read Twain`s, "Letters from the earth"? I have a copy. The church banned it like forever! -- Also to Irwin-R_S.... your quote of "anarchy of the subatomic world", reminds me of a famous egghead who studied mostly "electrons" saying, "they were the closest thing on earth to TRUE Black Magic". -- Love this stuff.

content: --- I can remember the two bunko cons who splashed the cold fusion news ago. At the time, I was really hoping for the best, being a lifelong cosmology student & deep into quantum mech., string therory, dark matter & now the latest & greatest, "Uneven Expansion" as in "our known universe lies within the center of a giant cosmic void". wow-Wow-WOW! Now this is the kind of thread worth reading! I got the scoop from my Apr. Scientific American mag. - Heavy stuff guys. --- P.S. -- Crackerjack - Yes, science is a pure republic. Also, have you read Twain`s, "Letters from the earth"? I have a copy. The church banned it like forever! -- Also to Irwin-R_S.... your quote of "anarchy of the subatomic world", reminds me of a famous egghead who studied mostly "electrons" saying, "they were the closest thing on earth to TRUE Black Magic". -- Love this stuff.

content: quote: Originally posted by crackerjacks61: Welcome to the 22nd Century Folks..this is what will power anti-gravity and a whole list of other technology. For those of you that want to keep using stone tablets and chisels, that's fine with me...but let the rest of us move fast and ahead toward the future. "The neutrons produced in the experiments "may not be caused by fusion but perhaps some new, unknown nuclear process," added Krivit, who has monitored cold fusion studies for the past 20 years. "We're talking about a new field of science that's a hybrid between chemistry and physics." "Scientists in possible cold fusion breakthrough" "Researchers at a US Navy laboratory have unveiled what they say is "significant" evidence of cold fusion, a potential energy source that has many skeptics in the scientific community. " "http://www.breitbart.com/article.php?id=CNG.a67cf72fe27770f9ec992da18169937d.a1&show_article=1" Cold Fusion Is Real! Well Well Well, I guess us C2C listeners are not so crazy at all.
